name: Thousands
summary:
The goal of Thousands is simple : destroy one thousand enemies as fast as possible. Along your way, you'll cross multiple worlds, leap across beautifully minimal landscapes, and chase kill streak records. 
 
The HTML5 demo showcases a limited version of just 1 world of the game. 
 
The full game brings you multiple worlds to explore and additional weapons at your disposal. Download today for a single dollar.

esrb.synopsis: While it is a hardcore shooter, the game doesn't feature realistic violence or graphic material that would make it unsuitable for younger players.
